definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: Every forum worker and manager is a chessman of company.
sentences.chinese: 每一個論壇的版主或管理員都是公司的一枚棋子。

sentences.english: Administrator and moderators forum to discuss local affairs. Do not non- Jin .
sentences.chinese: 管理員和版主們討論論壇事務的地方，非請勿進。

sentences.english: In the home of Webmaster Nan Tian Ma's friend, we had the lunch break.
sentences.chinese: 我們在南版主的吊家灣朋友家午餐休整。

sentences.english: Excellent moderators will be awarded a title of "The Vizir".
sentences.chinese: 對於優秀版主，我們將授予“元老”頭銜。

sentences.english: All spending of expansion points by users must be approved by moderators before going live.
sentences.chinese: 所有用戶的擴展點的開支，必須經版主纔去住。

sentences.english: Our administrators and moderators are all volunteers, and are not paid at all.
sentences.chinese: 我們的管理員和版主都是志願者，不計報酬。

sentences.english: BY ANY MEASURE, Florarui is a qualified forum leader.
sentences.chinese: 無論按任何標準來衡量，黑妹都是一個合格的版主。

sentences.english: Thanks your share good movie. The tale movie is very attract.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜歡這樣的好片啦，謝謝版主的分享。

sentences.english: When the professional Newspaperman ask for money, better just give them the kiss-off.
sentences.chinese: 遇到要錢的職業版主，最該做的就是直接走開。

sentences.english: Moderators should be able to ban users, or suspend accounts.
sentences.chinese: 版主應該能夠禁止用戶，或暫停帳戶。

sentences.english: Some are active members, or even moderators.
sentences.chinese: 有些人是活躍用戶，更有人甚至擔任論壇版主一職。

sentences.english: Moderators are forbidden from discussing moderator business anywhere except in the moderators -only discussion forum.
sentences.chinese: 禁止版主在此專區外討論與版務管理有關的話題。

sentences.english: SEO Research Inte, the Panel exchanges, moderator applications, plaints and suggestions.
sentences.chinese: SEO研究網事務交流，版主申請，建議與投訴。

sentences.english: The job of forum manager is another new career opportunity for young people.
sentences.chinese: 對年輕人來說，論壇版主是另一個就業機會。

sentences.english: Nobody is the one who must serve you.
sentences.chinese: 哪條版規說過版主一定要爲誰做補丁？

definition: chief editor (of newspaper)/abbr. for 總編輯|总编辑
specially engaged/employed or commissioned for a special task
to submit articles for publication/to contribute (writing)
person who writes articles - newspapers, magazines, blogs (informal)/scribe/copyist/a talented writer of articles or of calligraphy
